author: pmahoney
msg: TOMAHAWK-1168: Fix HTML for non-single element layout

author: niallp
msg: COMMONSSITE-21 - Configure the maven-release-plugin in the "rc" and "release" profiles with an "arguments" to specify the profile. This will (hopefully) resolve the issue of the deploy plugin not picking up the distribution management from the correct profile.

author: andreas
msg: News XSLT: handle XHTML documents where the first paragraph is included in other elements, e.g. <div id=body/>
